title: Search via push address in OllyDbg
content:
I have an address (eg. 00423D8C) and I would like to know how to make a search on the 
main thread
like this : 
PUSH 00423D8C
(and so is it is possible). Here is an example of what I would like to get if I can do this search.

answers_data.content:
Right click on disasm -> Search for -> All commands:

You put the command to search for (you can also use wildcards):

And you get a list of results:

Double-click on any result and it'll take you to that address in disasm view.

comments.text: Wonderful ! Superb answer! I spent 2 hours looking for it. many thanks !!
